LanguageData.VME_Power_Exalted.stages.0.label: divine rule
LanguageData.VME_Power_Exalted.stages.0.description: My rule is supreme, for I am godlike.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Desired.stages.0.label: in a position of power
LanguageData.VME_Power_Desired.stages.0.description: I feel important and everyone looks up to me.
LanguageData.VME_Power_Preferred.stages.0.label: i am important
LanguageData.VME_Power_Preferred.stages.0.description: I hold a reasonable position of power and I like that feeling
